Articles.Content: I'm pretty sure this thread isn't even updated anymore anyways, actually after doing a quick check the OP hasn't even been active on the forums since March, one of the Mods really should lock this thread and un-sticky it.

This is an excellent ship! I landed on Minmus, Mun, and crash landed into Kerbol with a (not-so-safely) ejected Kerbin into the ocean. Great design, easy to maneuver with plenty of fuel after circularization to get anywhere (two RCS tanks a surprising bonus to my fuel.) While the wings look great on this, my game renders them as schizophrenic tumblers so I removed them to keep the ship from looking like it was going to tear apart in stable circular orbit.
@voleurinconnu: Seconded! Mods, lets sticky a new thread at the release of .17
if no one has said this yet, most if not all of the links are dead.

Yeah, they're all dead because of the switch to vBulletin, and the fact that this thread hasn't been updated for months.

Also, yes that was said before, exactly one page prior to this one. Make sure you do a little looking before you ask a question, I'm not trying to be rude or anything, but that could certainly get on some forum goers nerves, and you'll likely not get an answer.
Any recommendations other than Munitar II for Mun landings in 0.16?
Is there any reason why when i click on a design it sends me back to the forum main page?
Yes FractiousBullet, the move to vBulletin has broken the old links and it's an enormous job to fix them, your best bet is to use the search box and put in the crafts name

I'm pretty sure this thread isn't even updated anymore anyways, actually after doing a quick check the OP hasn't even been active on the forums since March, one of the Mods really should lock this thread and un-sticky it.

Was just thinking the same thing...

but I think we should leave it here until we find someone willing to run the 0.17 and upwards one..

Thanks all for your interest and hard work, this thread is now closed and a new one has been created for version 0.17.. enjoy.

The-New-Stock-Repository-Version-0-17
